entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Shamattawa
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 22 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 22 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 33. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023
